translations.chinese: 上喜曰：「豨不南據邯鄲而阻漳水，吾知其亡能為矣。」
translations.english: The emperor was pleased and said: "Xi does not occupy Handan to the south and block the Zhang River. I know he has no ability."

translations.chinese: 趙相周昌奏常山二十五 城亡其二十城，請誅守尉。
translations.english: Zhao prime minister Zhou Chang memorialized that of Changshan's twenty-five cities, twenty cities were lost, requesting execution of the guards and commandants.
The emperor said: "Did the guards and commandants rebel?"
The emperor said: "Then their strength was insufficient. No crime."
